com.jme3.asset
Class AssetCache

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.asset.AssetCache

public class AssetCache
extends java.lang.Object

An AssetCache allows storage of loaded resources in order to improve their access time if they are requested again in a short period of time. The AssetCache stores weak references to the resources, allowing Java's garbage collector to request deletion of rarely used resources when heap memory is low.
